name: Cube Run Deluxe
description:
Cube Run Deluxe is a simple, yet challenging platforming game where you'll have to use your sense of timing to beat your friends' high scores and show everyone who's boss!


Time your jumps right with the help of an engaging soundtrack to boldly go where no cube has gone before. Collect gems to buy new skins for your cube for a unique experience.

What are you waiting for? It's time for a real Deluxe Run! Install now to enjoy this amazing platformer brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
